gobblin.config.store.hdfs

Class SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory
      • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultCapableLocalConfigStoreFactory

    public class SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory
extends SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory
    Extension of SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory that creates a SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore which works for the local file system.

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory

      • getPhysicalScheme

        protected String getPhysicalScheme()
        Description copied from class: SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory
        Returns the physical scheme this ConfigStoreFactory is responsible for. To support new HDFS FileSystem implementations, subclasses should override this method.
        Specified by:
        getPhysicalScheme in class SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory

        Returns the default FileSystem used for ConfigStores generated by this factory.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        factoryConfig - the user supplied factory configuration.
        configDefinedDefaultURI - if the user specified a default uri, that uri.
